Package com.pushwords.service

Class WordService

java.lang.Object
com.pushwords.service.WordService
public class WordService extends Object
WordService handles operations related to words and test results.

  • Method Details

    • addOrUpdate

      public ResultInfo<Word> addOrUpdate(String groupId, String title, String content)
      Adds or updates a word with the given group ID, title, and content.
      Parameters:
      groupId - the ID of the group the word belongs to
      title - the title of the word
      content - the content or description of the word
      Returns:
      a ResultInfo object containing the result of the add or update operation

    • findWordListByPage

      public Page<Word> findWordListByPage(String pageNumStr, String pageSizeStr, String groupIdStr)
      Finds a paginated list of words for a specific group.
      Parameters:
      pageNumStr - the page number as a string
      pageSizeStr - the page size as a string
      groupIdStr - the group ID as a string
      Returns:
      a Page object containing a list of words

    • deleteWord

      public void deleteWord(String wordId)
      Deletes a word by its ID.
      Parameters:
      wordId - the ID of the word to be deleted

    • updateWord

      public void updateWord(Word word)
      Updates the details of a word.
      Parameters:
      word - the Word object containing updated information

    • getWordsByGroupId

      public List<Word> getWordsByGroupId(int groupId)
      Retrieves a list of words for a specific group ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of Word objects

      Parameters:
